<title level="1" right="Archetype 2" pfs="Standard">[Pathfinder Agent](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=13)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
</traits>

**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 23 <sup>2.0</sup>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) All characters have access to Pathfinder Agent Dedication_

You’re a field agent of the globe-trotting Pathfinder Society, sworn to report, explore, and cooperate. You explore the world, gathering artifacts and antiquities, and record your adventures for posterity.

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 23 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
member of the Pathfinder Society

**Access**
You are from Absalom.

**Archetype Category**
Faction

**Number of Feats** 24
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
You’re a field agent of the globe-trotting Pathfinder Society, sworn to report, explore, and cooperate. You explore the world, gathering artifacts …
</summary>
